structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Supervisors of plants to be certified as to competency.
law.text: All water treatment plants and water distribution systems, whether publicly or privately owned, shall be under the supervision of an operator whose competency is certified to by the Energy and Environment Cabinet in a grade corresponding to the classification of the water supply system to be supervised. All operators holding valid and effective certificates issued under existing regulations of the State Board of Health on June 16, 1966, may, within the discretion of the Energy and Environment Cabinet, be issued new certificates without examination for any appropriate new classifications that may be established by the regulations adopted hereunder or such certificates may be continued in effect.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 339, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 47. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (10), (11). -- Amended 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 40. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 4.
